relics.name: Band of Stable Time
relics.description: You get 1 juxverse:Star at the start of combat. When you are dealt damage, get 1 Block for each juxverse:Star you have.
relics.flavorText: A platinum bracelet that prevents timelines from splitting in its vicinity.

relics.name: Wooden Flute
relics.description: Your first attack each turn deals 1 damage to ALL enemies for each juxverse:Star you have.
relics.flavorText: "I can't do much to help Aria with her hunting skill. However, she seems to like music, so I hope she sticks to it."

relics.name: Crystal Kris
relics.description: Whenever you end a turn with 3 or more juxverse:Stars, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: A blade of crystal made to taste only the blood of its creator.

relics.name: Flow Compass
relics.description: When you play 9 Skills, copy the next Skill you play.
relics.flavorText: A glass sphere and a black needle move in 3D space, tracing out the harmonics of magic.

relics.name: Key of Destinies
relics.description: At the start of your turn, Scry 3.
relics.flavorText: A wrought-iron key that controls destiny.

relics.name: Peace Branch
relics.description: When an enemy dies, prevent the next time you would lose HP this combat.
relics.flavorText: A stick formed from the resolution of a great conflict.

relics.name: Transcription Tablet
relics.description: Whenever you play a skill without juxverse:Constellation, gain 1 temporary juxverse:Star.
relics.flavorText: "Lexi was born without a voice. I gifted this to her, such that she may be able to write one herself."

relics.name: Meteor Hairpin
relics.description: Whenever a card is Exhausted, gain 1 temporary Strength.
relics.flavorText: "Silva is growing up to be more than suited for her noble role. Seeing as the shooting star represents luck, I hope this brings luck to her."

relics.name: Worldforge Fragment
relics.description: At the end of your turn, put a card from your hand on top of your deck.
relics.flavorText: A machine capable of casting the Allspell, left in pieces so it couldn't be used a second time.

relics.name: Tome of the Unknowable
relics.description: At the start of combat, add two random cards to your hand.
relics.flavorText: A nondescript book that holds the secrets of the world and wishes to share.

relics.name: Bag Of Carrots
relics.description: The first time a card is Exhausted each turn, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: Condensed sugar in a crisp orange packet.

relics.name: Cheap Flow Torch
relics.description: Once each combat, right-click this to spend
relics.flavorText: "I know we don't have a lot of money right now, but I want to make sure Caelum can grow up into the engineer he wants to be."

relics.name: Eitheiruiung
relics.description: Gain [E] [E] at the start of your turn. When you play 4 or more cards in a turn, you lose 4 HP.
relics.flavorText: The "Staff of Balance", formed to channel an endless amount of magic from the Tree of Life.

relics.name: Shadowrend
relics.description: When you deal unblocked damage, gain 1 temporary Strength.
relics.flavorText: A blade that devours even the soul of its wielder.

relics.name: Temporal Anchor
relics.description:
Replaces Band of Stable Time.
You get 3 juxverse:Stars at the start of combat. When you are dealt damage, get 1 Block for each juxverse:Star you have.
relics.flavorText: The activation of the Band of Stable Time locks down its active timeline, preventing (other) time travelers from jumping in unannounced.

relics.name: Model Fighter
relics.description: Whenever you play 5 or more cards in a turn, apply 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: "When Arctus left home, he left everything he cared about behind. I hope this model ship finds him well, so he may have something."

keywords.name: Juxverse:constellation
keywords.description: This effect is increased by each Star you have. After this card's effect, gain 1 temporary Star.

mods.name: Juxverse
mods.description: This is a mod featuring items, people, and spells from our Juxverse setting. Contains Starseeker.
